learner-dash.relatedPrograms.description: Are you looking to expand your knowledge? Enrolling in a Program lets you take a series of courses in the subject that you're interested in
learner-dash.selectSession.changeOrLeave: When you change to a different session any course progress or grades from your current session will be lost.
learner-dash.selectSession.selectSession: Remember, if you change your mind you have 2 weeks to unenroll and select a different session.

learner-dash.unenrollConfirm.reasons.dif: The course material was too hard
learner-dash.unenrollConfirm.reasons.goa: This won't help me reach my goals

leanerDashboard.confirmEmailTextReminder: Remember to confirm your email so that you can keep learning! {confirmNowButton}.
leanerDashboard.confirmEmailModalBody: We've sent you an email to verify your account. Please check your inbox and click on the big red button to confirm and keep learning.
learner-dash.unenrollConfirm.confirm.tex: Are you sure you want to unenroll from the course {courseTitle} ?
learner-dash.unenrollConfirm.confirm.fin: You have been unenrolled from the course {courseTitle}
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.auditAcc: Your audit access to this course has expired.
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.certific: Your Certificate of Achievement is being held pending confirmation that the issuance of your Certificate is in compliance with strict U.S. embargoes on Iran, Cuba, Syria, and Sudan. If you think our system has mistakenly identified you as being connected with one of those countries, please let us know by contacting {supportEmail}.

Your Certificate of Achievement is being held pending confirmation that the issuance of your Certificate is in compliance with strict U.S. embargoes on Iran, Cuba, Syria, and Sudan. If you think our system has mistakenly identified you as being connected with one of those countries, please let us know.
If you would like a refund on your Certificate of Achievement, please contact our billing address {billingEmail}
If you would like a refund on your Certificate of Achievement, please contact us.

learner-dash.courseCard.banners.notEligi: You are not eligible for a certificate.
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.gradseAn: Your grade and certificate will be ready after {availableDate}.
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.entitlem: There are no sessions available at the moment. The course team will create new sessions soon. If no sessions appear, please contact {emailLink} for information.
You must {selectSessionButton} by {changeDeadline} to access the course.
You can no longer change sessions.
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.prerequi: You can't access this course just yet because you have not met the pre-requisites.
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.courseHa: You can't access this course just yet because the course hasn't started yet. The course will start on {startDate}.
learner-dash.courseCardMenu.shareQuote: I'm taking {courseName} online with {socialBrand}. Check it out!

An error occurred with this transaction.
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.credit.a: {congratulations} {providerName} has approved your request for course credit. To see your course credit, visit the {linkToProviderSite} website.
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.credit.e: You have completed this course and are eligible to purchase course credit. Select {getCredit} to get started.
You are now eligible for credit from {providerName}. Congratulations!
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.credit.m: Thank you for your payment. To receive course credit, you must request credit at the {linkToProviderSite} website. Select {requestCredit} to get started
learner-dash.courseCard.banners.credit.r: {providerName} has received your course credit request. We will update you when credit processing is complete.
{providerName} did not approve your request for course credit. For more information, contact {linkToProviderSite} directly.
